HeroSection.title:
Your Health,
Understood.
HeroSection.subtitle: Feeling unwell? Describe your symptoms and our AI will suggest the right specialist for you.
HeroSection.cardDescription: Don't know where to start? Let our AI guide you.
HeroSection.symptomsPlaceholder: e.g., 'I have a persistent headache and feel dizzy...'

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Get expert medical care in three simple steps.
HowItWorks.step1Description: Search by specialty or symptoms to find the right doctor for you.
HowItWorks.step2Description: Choose a convenient time and book a video, audio, or in-clinic visit.
HowItWorks.step3Description: Connect with your doctor from the comfort of your home.

DoctorSearch.title: Find a Doctor
DoctorSearch.subtitle: Search for doctors by specialty, location, or consultation type.

Specialties.title: Browse by Specialty
Specialties.subtitle: Find the right specialist from our wide range of medical fields.
